mapper.select: select a.f_info_id,a.f_meta_description,a.f_title, b.f_publish_date from cms_info_detail a join cms_info b on a.f_info_id = b.f_info_id where b.f_node_id in (select f_node_id from cms_node where f_parent_id = #{nodeId}) or b.f_node_id = #{nodeId} order by b.f_publish_date desc limit #{itemStart}, #{pageSize}

select count(1) as totalCount from cms_info_detail a join cms_info b on a.f_info_id = b.f_info_id where b.f_node_id in (select f_node_id from cms_node where f_parent_id = #{nodeId}) or b.f_node_id = #{parentId}
